meanings.definition: A person who works in the field of biotechnology.
meanings.sent1: Biotechnologists study how living things can be used in technology.
meanings.sent2: Many biotechnologists work in laboratories to discover new medicines.
meanings.sent3: The biotechnologists at the company accidentally created a glowing plant!
meanings.sent4: In the world of science, biotechnologists are like modern-day alchemists.
meanings.sent5: The classroom buzzed with excitement as the biotechnologists presented their latest project.

meanings.definition: Those who apply biological organisms, systems, or processes to develop products or technologies.
meanings.sent1: Biotechnologists use bacteria to make eco-friendly cleaning products.
meanings.sent2: The biotechnologists collaborated with engineers to design a new biofuel.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, the biotechnologists joked about creating a cake that bakes itself.
meanings.sent4: The biotechnologists' creativity blossomed as they merged nature with innovation.
meanings.sent5: The company's success was attributed to the brilliant minds of the biotechnologists.
